content: whether in a chilly house or on a wintery hike accogliente socks will keep your feet toasty warm this easy top down pattern written for worsted weight yarn is great for both beginner sock knitters and makes a great quick project for more advanced knitters these socks take exactly 100g if you have a longer foot or prefer a longer leg purchase an additional skein so you don t run out or better yet knit the heels and toes in a contrasting color
